author: Jessica
excerpt: Hello, perfect summer friday! EATING Grilled chicken caesar sandwiches. My favorite smash burgers! Also grilled veggie orzo. And caesar pasta salad too. DRINKING Mango frosé! Refreshing and fun for the weekend. MAKING Red white and pickled blueberry burrata. And my bruschetta pasta salad, for sure. BAKING My red white and berry sheet pan shortcake! CRAVING My […]
text: Hello, perfect summer friday! EATING Grilled chicken caesar sandwiches. My favorite smash burgers! Also grilled veggie orzo. And caesar pasta salad too. DRINKING Mango frosé! Refreshing and fun for the weekend. MAKING Red white and pickled blueberry burrata. And my bruschetta pasta salad, for sure. BAKING My red white and berry sheet pan shortcake! CRAVING My grilled peaches with burrata and pistachios. SNACKING On this summer marinated goat cheese. It’s fabulous and gets better as it sits. GRILLING The best summer mushroom pizza! Also this grilled shrimp orzo. Divine. LISTENING To our 4th of July playlist! READING The Art of Vanishing and loving it! WEARING This bright red anjuli nap dress! I still live in my nap dresses, they are SO comfortable. I love this version that just looks slightly updated. Plus this denim jacket. And these raffia slides that I love. I’m also obsessed with these strappy flat sandals. Everything from the cushionaire brand is so comfortable. LOVING This epres bond repair hair treatment! I got some blonde back in my hair and have been using this the past two weeks, and now will switch to once a month. It’s GREAT. I spray it on and leave it for a few hours before washing. I also really like this k18 astrolift volume spray! SHOPPING Just bought this little woven satchel that is very designer inspired. And the varley midi tank dress. Such high quality and I love how it can be dressed up or down. Also still loving the zip through knit! My naghedi bag obsession is still 50% off! And P.S. if you love farm rio like I do!!!! SHARING Last year my SIL told me to do our school supply shopping right after the 4th to get it done, out of the way and to enjoy the rest of summer. I’m doing that early next week and I started my list for back to school! I also like to do teacher care packages every year. CELERATING The 4th of July with everything delicious this weekend! Have a safe and happy 4th!
html:
Hello, perfect summer friday!

EATING

Grilled chicken caesar sandwiches. My favorite smash burgers! Also grilled veggie orzo. And caesar pasta salad too.

DRINKING

Mango frosé! Refreshing and fun for the weekend.

MAKING

Red white and pickled blueberry burrata. And my bruschetta pasta salad, for sure.

BAKING

My red white and berry sheet pan shortcake!

CRAVING

My grilled peaches with burrata and pistachios.

SNACKING

On this summer marinated goat cheese. It’s fabulous and gets better as it sits.

GRILLING

The best summer mushroom pizza! Also this grilled shrimp orzo. Divine.

LISTENING

To our 4th of July playlist!

READING

The Art of Vanishing and loving it!

WEARING

This bright red anjuli nap dress! I still live in my nap dresses, they are SO comfortable. I love this version that just looks slightly updated. Plus this denim jacket. And these raffia slides that I love. I’m also obsessed with these strappy flat sandals. Everything from the cushionaire brand is so comfortable.

LOVING

This epres bond repair hair treatment! I got some blonde back in my hair and have been using this the past two weeks, and now will switch to once a month. It’s GREAT. I spray it on and leave it for a few hours before washing. I also really like this k18 astrolift volume spray!

SHOPPING

Just bought this little woven satchel that is very designer inspired. And the varley midi tank dress. Such high quality and I love how it can be dressed up or down. Also still loving the zip through knit! My naghedi bag obsession is still 50% off! And P.S. if you love farm rio like I do!!!!

SHARING

Last year my SIL told me to do our school supply shopping right after the 4th to get it done, out of the way and to enjoy the rest of summer. I’m doing that early next week and I started my list for back to school! I also like to do teacher care packages every year.

CELERATING

The 4th of July with everything delicious this weekend! Have a safe and happy 4th!
